posts.title: Coping with Exam Anxiety
posts.content: I've been struggling with anxiety before exams. Any tips on how to manage this effectively?

posts.title: Self-Care Routines for Students
posts.content: What are some effective self-care routines that fit into a busy student schedule?

posts.title: Managing Time Between Studies and Mental Health
posts.content: How do you balance academic responsibilities with taking care of your mental health?

comments: I found deep breathing exercises really helpful before exams. Try the 4-7-8 technique!
Regular exercise has been a game-changer for my anxiety levels. Even just a 20-minute walk helps.
I've started setting aside 30 minutes each morning for meditation and it's made a huge difference.
Have you tried talking to your professor about accommodations? Many are understanding about anxiety.
reportReasons: This post is offensive or harmful
